obfuscation: Of course I 'm certain .
original: Of course I'm sure.

obfuscation: It was awful big .
original: It was awful big.

obfuscation: The biggest fish I ever saw .
original:
The biggest fish I ever
saw.

obfuscation: Even in Russia we do not have such big fish as whales .
original: Even in Russia we do not have such big fish as whales.

obfuscation: Paddy Mike saw it , besides .
original:
Paddy Mike
saw it, too.

obfuscation: Sure and I did .
original: Sure and I did.

obfuscation: And me two eyes nearly fell out of me lead with lookin ' at it , it was that wonderful .
original:
And me two eyes nearly fell out of me head
with lookin' at it, it was that wonderful.

obfuscation: He shot a big stream of water right up out of his mind , he did , and then he dived down in the ocean again , and we did n't see him any more at all , at all .
original:
He shot a big stream of
water right up out of his head, he did, and then he dived down in the
ocean again, and we didn't see him any more at all, at all.

obfuscation: There !
original: There!

obfuscation: nowadays if you get to see the great big whale , that 's almost as good as having old Saint Nicholas come , ain't it ?
original:
Now if you get to see the great big
whale, that's almost as good as having old Saint Nicholas come, ain't
it?

obfuscation: Whales ca n't bring you no Christmas presents , can they , Klinker ?
original:
Whales can't bring you no Christmas presents, can they,
Klinker?

obfuscation: Und whales you can see any time .
original: Und whales you can see any time.

obfuscation: I 'd rather have Saint Nicholas , would n't I , Schwillie Willie Winkum ?
original:
I'd rather have Saint
Nicholas, wouldn't I, Schwillie Willie Winkum?

obfuscation: Who is this Saint Nicholas they are looking for , Hulda ?
original: Who is this Saint Nicholas they are looking for, Hulda?

obfuscation: Why , make n't you know who he is yet ?
original: Why, don't you know who he is yet?

obfuscation: He 's the best old man that ever was .
original:
He's the best
old man that ever was.

obfuscation: Und he comes the night before Christmas und visits all the little children in Holland .
original:
Und he comes the night before Christmas und
visits all the little children in Holland.

obfuscation: Und in Germany , besides .
original: Und in Germany, too.

obfuscation: Und if they 're good they get candy und oranges und toys und things , make n't they , Schwillie Willie Winkum ?
original:
Und if they're good they get candy und oranges und toys und
things, don't they, Schwillie Willie Winkum?

obfuscation: Und if they 're bad , they get a good big birch stick .
original: Und if they're bad, they get a good big birch stick.

obfuscation: But I ai n't been bad .
original:
But I
ain't been bad.

obfuscation: I 've been awfully good , is n't I , Klinker ?
original: I've been awfully good, isn't I, Klinker?

obfuscation: Sure .
original: Sure.

obfuscation: Und me also .
original: Und me also.

obfuscation: On Christmas Eve in Holland all the children march around the streets , following one who carries a big silver star .
original:
On Christmas Eve in Holland all the children
march around the streets, following one who carries a big silver star.

obfuscation: And the people who meet us give us money and gifts to help the inadequate .
original: And the people who meet us give us money and gifts to help the poor.

obfuscation: Oh , Christmas time is just grand in Holland !
original: Oh, Christmas time is just grand in Holland!

obfuscation: Und we set out our leedle wooden shoes und old Saint Nicholas fills 'em with candy .
original:
Und we set out our leedle wooden shoes und old Saint Nicholas
fills 'em with candy.
